visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart displaying the USD to EUR exchange rate over time. The chart should have a title 'USD to EUR Exchange Rate Over Time', with styled axes and labels. The data series should be named 'USD to EUR' and use the provided data from the JSON file. Custom colors should be applied to the series, and additional configurations should include zooming functionality and a subtitle explaining how to interact with the chart.

title.text: USD to EUR Exchange Rate Over Time

subtitle.text: Click and drag in the plot area to zoom in

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart to display the USD to EUR exchange rate over time. The chart includes a title and subtitle, both aligned to the left and styled with specific font sizes and colors. The x-axis is set to display dates, and the y-axis is labeled 'Exchange rate'. The chart allows for x-axis zooming, enhancing user interaction. The series is named 'USD to EUR' and uses a gradient color scheme for the spline, with custom colors applied. The legend is disabled, and additional styling is applied to the markers and hover states of the spline. The data for the series is expected to be populated from an external JSON file, as indicated in the original JavaScript code.
